<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Megalodon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=366)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Prehistoric sharks of incredible size, strength, and ferocity, megalodons scour waters deep and shallow to sate their considerable hunger. The presence of a megalodon undeniably affects the local aquatic ecosystem.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Shark_Megalodon.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Megalodon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=366)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 291</row>

**Perception** +20; blood scent, scent (imprecise) 100 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +2

**Con** +5

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Blood Scent** The shark can smell blood in the water from up to 1 mile away.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 180

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** swim 80 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +22 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+10 piercing plus Improved Grab

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+10 piercing plus Push 15 feet

**Breach** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The shark Swims up to its swim Speed, then Leaps vertically out of the water up to 25 feet high, making a Strike against a creature at any point during the jump (this lets it attack a creature within 35 feet of the water’s surface or 40 feet with its tail). After the Strike, the shark splashes back down into the water.

**Savage** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirement** The shark hit with a jaws Strike on its most recent action this turn. **Effect** The creature the shark hit takes 2d12 slashing damage.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Huge, 2d8+5 bludgeoning, Rupture 20

</column>
